key.name: privacy_not_changed
key.value: You cant change Privacy of this information

key.name: my_post_on_feed_newsfeed_description
key.value: by modification of this option, the access right to your default posts will be changed

key.name: other_post_on_feed_newsfeed
key.value: The default post written by others for me

key.name: other_post_on_feed_newsfeed_description
key.value: by modification of this option, the access right to default post written by others for you will be changed

key.name: last_post_of_others_newsfeed
key.value: Last posts of other on profile

key.name: last_post_of_myself_newsfeed
key.value: Last posts of myself on profile

key.name: who_post_on_newsfeed
key.value: Who can post on my feed

key.name: who_post_on_newsfeed_description
key.value: by modification of this option, the access right to write in your profile will be changed

key.name: video_default_privacy_description
key.value: by modification of this option, the access right to your default videos will be changed

key.name: view_user_comment_widget
key.value: View profile user comment widget (It is not recommended)

key.name: verify_using_code
key.value: Account activation via the verification code that has been sent

key.name: verify_using_resend_email
key.value: Return to resend verification code form

key.name: last_post_of_myself_newsfeed_description
key.value: by modification of this option, the access right for all your previous posts in your profile will be changed

key.name: last_post_of_others_newsfeed_description
key.value: by modification of this option, the access right for all other previous posts in your profile will be changed

key.name: privacy_setting_description
key.value: You can set the default value of privacy items here. Also users can set value of these items for themselves

key.name: privacy_value_empty
key.value: You don't set the default value of this item

key.name: plugin_privacy_not_exist_description
key.value: Plugin of privacy does not exist. For managing the privacy of contents, you should install the privacy plugin

key.name: index_status_enabled_desc
key.value: This option is disabled because of security issues

key.name: delete_feed_item_confirmation
key.value: Are you sure to delete this post from your profile?

key.name: approve_user_after_edit_profile_label
key.value: Do not need user approval after editing profile (In case of mandatory user's approve)

key.name: newsfeed_homepage_setting
key.value: show activities in main page's setting

key.name: admin_customization_legend
key.value: Here you may control which type of content is shown in main page. Please note that any changes will be applied to _new_ content only

key.name: passwordRequiredProfile
key.value: Require password before saving profile changes

key.name: email_is_not_registered
key.value: No user found with this email

key.name: privacy_not_set_message
key.value: Your Privacy setting has not been saved yet

key.name: remember_me_default_value
key.value: Activate remember me in sign-in page

key.name: input_settings_valid_ip_list_desc
key.value: Insert valid IP addresses that has access to admin panel. Enter one IP for each row

key.name: editor_password
key.value: Enter the following field to apply changes

key.name: ie_message
key.value: To access this website, please use Google Chrome, Firefox or Edge .

key.name: ie_message_enabled
key.value: Display an alert for IE users

key.name: disable_verify_peer
key.value: Disable Verify Peer config for initializing php mailer connection

key.name: delete_user_form_desc
key.value: This form is to delete users permanently, with all data and files. Please beware that you cannot reverse this process after deletion.

key.name: email_all_deleted_users
key.value: Notify the affected users using Email

key.name: your_password_desc
key.value: For security purposes, please enter your password.

key.name: delete_user_submit_warning
key.value: Please beware that you cannot reverse user deletion after submitting this form.

key.name: auth_action_label_user_can_view_comments
key.value: View comments in all sections to users

key.name: extract_file_error
key.value: There is a problem in extracting files

key.name: system_code_permission_denied
key.value: There is no permission to update these files

key.name: system_code_update_can_not_write
key.value: There is no permission to update these files:

key.name: system_code_update_description
key.value: For updating system, you can compress (zip) new files and upload them with their folders. For example if you want to upload content_provider.php file from classes folder in blogs plugin, you should compress (zip) this file with it's directories (ow_plugins/blogs/classes/content_provider.php) and upload them here.

key.name: reset_services_description
key.value: After code change, some services may need to be restarted. You can force them to restart with this button.

key.name: disable_user_get_other_sites_content
key.value: enable get other site contents only for admin

key.name: user_can_change_account_type
key.value: user can change his/her account type

key.name: warningAlert_enable_desc
key.value: By activating the warning, it will be sent publicly to all users

key.name: warningAlert_types_desc
key.value: In the both type, both forms of the message are sent

key.name: warningAlert_action_desc
key.value: It is a type of command code that is used by developers to perform operations.
